entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023
